name: Coloring Book 28
description: This coloring book app is filled with coloring pages that step you through world history! Beginning with prehistoric times, each page is a different historical event and the coloring book progresses chronologically. The pages show major events, inventions, and discoveries such as the ice age, Aztec calendar stone, and the invention of the printing press. Also included are historical figures such as Cleopatra, Shakespeare, and Galileo. This 50 page coloring book is an excellent introduction to the history of countries around the world!
